name: The Ganzfeld Effect
description:
Don't be afraid and come play "The Ganzfeld Effect". Navigate through the mines and kill any monsters you come across by jumping at them! Good luck!

CONTROLS:

- A & D to turn the cart

- SpaceBar to jump

Good luck!

KNOWN BUGS:

- Restart not working!

- Highscore not working

Notes:

Really had some cool stuff planned for this game, but some school stress came in between which took up all my time :(

Anyway, with a few hours left to finish the game, I decided to change it into a cheap horror game. I'm planning on making my original idea of the game in the future! Hope you guys like the game anyway!
